articles.title: Galaxy S20 vs. OnePlus 8 camera comparison: Zoom trumps macro - Android Central
articles.description: The Galaxy S20 and OnePlus 8 both have triple camera arrays, but Samsung and OnePlus went in different directions for the individual lenses in those systems. Both phones take great photos, but in the end one is more well-rounded and versatile than the other.

articles.title: Raspberry Pi 4 Now Available With 8GB of RAM, 64-Bit OS - ExtremeTech
articles.description: Combined with its quad-core ARM chip and ample I/O options, the latest Raspberry Pi 4 can take on even more tasks that would have required a PC in the past. It even has a new 64-bit OS to leverage all that RAM.
